questionData.instruction: Translate the following sentence into Chinese.
questionData.source_text: The weather is very good today.

questionData.instruction: Translate the following sentence into Chinese.
reference_translations: 我期待尽快收到你的来信。
我期待着很快收到你的消息。
期待早日收到您的回复。
questionData.source_text: I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

questionData.instruction: Translate the following sentence into Chinese.
reference_translations: 据说新政策将于下个月实施。
听说新政策将在下个月实行。
questionData.source_text: It is said that the new policy will be implemented next month.

questionData.instruction: Translate the following sentence into Chinese.
reference_translations: 她喜欢在空闲时间读书。
她喜欢在业余时间看书的。
questionData.source_text: She likes to read books in her free time.

questionData.instruction: Translate the following sentence into Chinese.
reference_translations: 我们昨天讨论的那个项目非常重要。
我们昨天讨论的项目非常重要。
questionData.source_text: The project that we discussed yesterday is very important.
